node.name: Hasher
node.shortdescription: This plugin is used to generate the MD5, SHA-1, SHA-256, SHA-384, or SHA-512 hashes of one or more files in an Eclipse project. After installing this plugin, you'll have a new option on your right-click menu called Hasher. Select a hash algorithm, and voilà, you have your hash.
node.body: This plugin is used to generate the MD5, SHA-1, SHA-256, SHA-384, or SHA-512 hashes of one or more files in an Eclipse project. After installing this plugin, you'll have a new option on your right-click menu called Hasher. Select a hash algorithm, and voilà, you have your hash.
